description: This ebook provides a guide to some of the greatest, most interesting, and must-hear albums of all time. This is much more than just a guide to the most popular albums of all time, which would be less interesting and quite uninformative because everyone already knows the most popular albums of all time. Therefore this guide focuses on albums which are great but not necessarily the most popular, and there is a considerable priority put on albums which influenced musicians who came after them and the history of music in general. There is no particular focus on any particular genre, though there is considerable consideration of rock, jazz, and hip-hop, and an effort to explore the full histories of these important genres. Another aspect of the intention of this guide is to stimulate readers into listening to a genre which they may be fairly unfamiliar with, or simply distrustful of. Download this guide today and enjoy music like you never have before!
